Record.ClassificationPath: Female Urogenital Diseases and Pregnancy Complications/Female Urogenital Diseases/Urologic Diseases/Ureteral Diseases/Ureterocele
Record.BroaderTerm: Female Urogenital Diseases and Pregnancy Complications
Record.Description: A cystic dilatation of the end of a URETER as it enters into the URINARY BLADDER. It is characterized by the ballooning of the ureteral orifice into the lumen of the bladder and may obstruct urine flow.
